creator: alliea@aol.com
text:
I'd like to be able to send back a malformed status line for regression testing 
of a proxy.  I see that most of the status line is automatically generated.  
Possibly there could be a setStatusLine() method introduced for 
HttpServletResponse?  thanks

I'm looking at: 
jakarta-tomcat-3.3-m4/src/share/org/apache/tomcat/modules/server/Http10.java

creator: cmanolache@yahoo.com
text:
That's how sendStatus should work... We'll try it later ( probably need
to set a note in response, and use it in the connectors ). Please send
a patch if you have one.
The CoyoteConnector will set the status line to the value passed to setStatus.
creator: william.barker@wilshire.com
